books.author: by Mark R. Levin
books.description: The talk-radio host offers 11 proposals for returning to America’s founding principles.
books.name: THE LIBERTY AMENDMENTS

books.author: by Reza Aslan
books.description: A biography of Jesus of Nazareth presents him in the context of his times as the leader of a revolutionary movement.
books.name: ZEALOT

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A memoir by a Brooklyn woman whose relationship with a drug runner gets her sentenced to a year in prison. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Mark Leibovich
books.description: An examination of Washington’s “media-industrial complex” by the chief national correspondent for The Times Magazine.
books.name: THIS TOWN

books.author: by Phil Robertson with Mark Schlabach
books.description: The Duck Commander pays tribute to “faith, family and ducks.”
books.name: HAPPY, HAPPY, HAPPY

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Jane Velez-Mitchell
books.description: The story of Jodi Arias, who was convicted of murdering her boyfriend, Travis Alexander.
books.name: EXPOSED

books.author: by Scott Anderson
books.description: A history of the Arab revolt against the Turks in World War I focuses on T.E. Lawrence and other adventurers.
books.name: LAWRENCE IN ARABIA

books.author: by Wil Haygood
books.description: Eugene Allen served eight presidents from Harry Truman to Ronald Reagan. Haygood’s Washington Post article about him inspired the movie "Lee Daniels' The Butler."
books.name: BUTLER

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Why some people succeed; from the author of "Blink" and "The Tipping Point."
books.name: OUTLIERS

books.author: by Abigail Thomas
books.description: How Thomas rebuilt her life after her husband sustained a devastating brain injury in a car accident. Originally published in 2006.
books.name: A THREE DOG LIFE

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood during which she was constantly moved from place to place.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS
